HomePage.resume: An Informatics student at Ahmad Dahlan University in the 6th semester, actively developing skills in both front-end and back-end development. Strongly interested in web development and continuously deepening knowledge of modern web technologies to build functional and engaging applications.

services.title: Services
services.sub_title: Currently, I work as a freelancer and also offer academic assistance (freelance coding help) for tasks related to programming or web development. I help individuals, students, and businesses complete their web projects with effective and targeted solutions.

cta.title: Interested in working together?
cta.sub_title: I'm open to freelance projects and academic coding assistance. Feel free to email me and let's discuss how I can help you.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello! Thank you for visiting my personal website. I'm Sholahudin Jauhari El Sya'na, an Informatics student at Ahmad Dahlan University, currently in my 6th semester. I have a strong passion for web development, focusing on both frontend and backend areas. I actively explore and develop my skills in building modern web applications.
resume.paragraf_2: I specialize in creating web solutions that are not only functional but also visually appealing and user-friendly. My technical stack includes JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js. I also work as a freelancer and offer academic programming services, including project assistance. I'm a fast learner, always eager to adapt to new technologies and improve continuously.
resume.paragraf_3: I believe that effective communication and teamwork are the foundations of successful collaboration. With strong adaptability, analytical thinking, and a collaborative spirit, I enjoy working in dynamic environments. I am open to freelance projects and excited about opportunities to collaborate with others!
